history.proof: intros x. unfold succZ, predZ. destruct x. - reflexivity. - hauto lq: on depth: 3. - hauto lq: on depth: 3.

original: intros x. unfold succZ, predZ. destruct x. - reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite BinInt.Zsucc_pred. reflexivity. - simpl. reflexivity.
